instruction.value: Administer by continuous infusion. Titrate dose every 3 to 5 minutes as required in increments of 0.5 to 1 mcg/kg/minute.
Adminnister by continuous infusion. Initiate dose at 5 to 10 mcg/minute and titrate dose with 5 to 10 mcg/minute increments every 3 to 5 minutes until desired hemodynamic or clinical response.
Administer by continuous infusion. Initiate dose at 0.1 to 0.2 mcg/kg/minute. Titrate dose with 0.1 mcg/kg/minute increments every 3 to 5 minutes until response noted.
Administer by continuous infusion. Initiate dose at 5 to 10 mcg/minute and titrate dose with 5 to 10 mcg/minute increments every 3 to 5 minutes until desired hemodynamic or clinical response.

AdditionalNotes.value: If no response at 20 mcg/minute, increments of 10 to 20 mcg/minute can be used.
If no response at dose of 0.3 mcg/kg/minute, increase by increments of 0.2 to 0.4 mcg/kg/minute.
